attributes.action: make the use of auditory bird scarers (bangers) between 8pm and 8am a statutory nuisance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Auditory bird scarers (bangers, gas cannons) are becoming an increasing nuisence as they become more widely used, particularly when within a mile or two of dwellings.

While we accept the need for them we do however believe that they should not be permitted to interrupt peoples sleep, typically before 8am.

We therefore petition the PM to introduce ligislation which makes use of auditory bird scarers a statutory nuisance when they sound between 8pm and 8am.
